itunes:summary:
Each week we are going to alternate our two other shows, Launchcode Podcast and Ross Patterson Revolution Podcast on Friday's for anyone who has a long drive and needed an extra show to get them through the work week.  This week on RPR, Ross and Jessie discuss the Feds being worried about terrorism at "Burning Man", Tucker Carlson beating the entire CNN primetime lineup in the ratings by himself, and Joaquin Phoenix playing "The Joker".

Subscribe to Ross Patterson Revolution here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/ross-patterson-revolution/id1219859725?mt=2

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
